narrative.inOrderTo: open existing and create new stories
narrative.iWantTo: be able to browse files and directories

scenario.title: Can open dialog
scenario.step: Given Web home page is opened
When Web user clicks the element browseStories
Then Web element modalHeader should have text Browse Stories

scenario.title: Can navigate through directories
scenario.step: Given Web user is in the Browse Stories dialog
When Web user clicks the element tcbdd
Then Web element dirPath should have text tcbdd/
